sections.title: Text 1 孙月和王静聊王静的男朋友
sections.title_pinyin: Text 1  sūn yuè hé wáng jìng liáo wáng jìng de nán péng yǒu
sections.title_meaning: Text 1 Sun Yue and Wang Jing chat about Wang Jing’s boyfriend

words.sentence: 我学的是法律，我和他不是一个班。
words.sentence_pinyin: wǒ xué de shì fǎ lǜ ， wǒ hé tā bú shì yí gè bān 。
words.sentence_meaning: I studied law, and he and I were not in the same class.

words.sentence: 那你们俩是怎么认识的？
words.sentence_pinyin: nà nǐ men liǎ shì zěn me rèn shí de ？
words.sentence_meaning: So how did you two meet?

words.sentence: 我对他的印象很深。
words.sentence_pinyin: wǒ duì tā de yìn xiàng hěn shēn 。
words.sentence_meaning: I was very impressed with him.

words.sentence: 我对他的印象很深。
words.sentence_pinyin: wǒ duì tā de yìn xiàng hěn shēn 。
words.sentence_meaning: I was very impressed with him.

words.sentence: 后来就慢慢熟悉了。
words.sentence_pinyin: hòu lái jiù màn màn shú xī le 。
words.sentence_meaning: Later I gradually became familiar with it.

words.sentence: 他不仅足球踢得好，性格也不错。
words.sentence_pinyin: tā bù jǐn zú qiú tī dé hǎo ， xìng gé yě bù cuò 。
words.sentence_meaning: Not only does he play football well, he also has a good personality.

words.sentence: 他不仅足球踢得好，性格也不错。
words.sentence_pinyin: tā bù jǐn zú qiú tī dé hǎo ， xìng gé yě bù cuò 。
words.sentence_meaning: Not only does he play football well, he also has a good personality.

sections.title: Text 2 王静跟李老师聊她要结婚的事情
sections.title_pinyin: Text 2  wáng jìng gēn lǐ lǎo shī liáo tā yào jié hūn de shì qíng
sections.title_meaning: Text 2 Wang Jing talks to Teacher Li about her getting married

words.sentence: 你是在开玩笑吧？
words.sentence_pinyin: nǐ shì zài kāi wán xiào ba ？
words.sentence_meaning: Are you kidding me?

words.sentence: 但我从来没这么快乐过。
words.sentence_pinyin: dàn wǒ cóng lái méi zhè me kuài lè guò 。
words.sentence_meaning: But I've never been so happy.

words.sentence: 两个人在一起，最好能有共同的兴趣和爱好。
words.sentence_pinyin: liǎng gè rén zài yì qǐ ， zuì hǎo néng yǒu gòng tóng de xìng qù hé ài hào 。
words.sentence_meaning: When two people are together, it is best to have common interests and hobbies.

words.sentence: 最好能有共同的兴趣和爱好。
words.sentence_pinyin: zuì hǎo néng yǒu gòng tóng de xìng qù hé ài hào 。
words.sentence_meaning: It is best to have common interests and hobbies.

words.sentence: 看来你真的找到适合你的人了。
words.sentence_pinyin: kàn lái nǐ zhēn de zhǎo dào shì hé nǐ de rén le 。
words.sentence_meaning: It seems like you have really found the right person for you.

words.sentence: 祝你们幸福！
words.sentence_pinyin: zhù nǐ men xìng fú ！
words.sentence_meaning: I wish you happiness!

sections.title: Text 3 高老师和李老师聊结婚后的生活
sections.title_pinyin: Text 3  gāo lǎo shī hé lǐ lǎo shī liáo jié hūn hòu de shēng huó
sections.title_meaning: Text 3 Teacher Gao and Teacher Li talk about life after marriage

words.sentence: 这么多年，我们的生活一直挺幸福的。
words.sentence_pinyin: zhè me duō nián ， wǒ men de shēng huó yì zhí tǐng xìng fú de 。
words.sentence_meaning: Our life has been quite happy for so many years.

words.sentence: 我和丈夫刚结婚的时候，每天都觉得很新鲜。
words.sentence_pinyin: wǒ hé zhàng fū gāng jié hūn de shí hòu ， měi tiān dōu jué de hěn xīn xiān 。
words.sentence_meaning: When my husband and I first got married, every day felt fresh.

words.sentence: 两个人共同生活，只有浪漫和新鲜感是不够的。
words.sentence_pinyin: liǎng gè rén gòng tóng shēng huó ， zhǐ yǒu làng màn hé xīn xiān gǎn shì bù gòu de 。
words.sentence_meaning: For two people to live together, romance and freshness are not enough.

words.sentence: 只有浪漫和新鲜感是不够的。
words.sentence_pinyin: zhǐ yǒu làng màn hé xīn xiān gǎn shì bù gòu de 。
words.sentence_meaning: Romance and novelty alone are not enough.

words.sentence: 我现在每天看到的都是他的缺点。
words.sentence_pinyin: wǒ xiàn zài měi tiān kàn dào de dōu shì tā de quē diǎn 。
words.sentence_meaning: All I see now are his flaws every day.

words.sentence: 只有接受了他的缺点，你们才能更好地一起生活。
words.sentence_pinyin: zhǐ yǒu jiē shòu le tā de quē diǎn ， nǐ men cái néng gèng hǎo dì yì qǐ shēng huó 。
words.sentence_meaning: Only by accepting his shortcomings can you live a better life together.

sections.title: Text 4 什么是浪漫
sections.title_pinyin: Text 4  shén me shì làng màn
sections.title_meaning: Text 4 What is romance

words.sentence: 很多女孩子羡慕浪漫的爱情。
words.sentence_pinyin: hěn duō nǚ hái zi xiàn mù làng màn de ài qíng 。
words.sentence_meaning: Many girls envy romantic love.

words.sentence: 很多女孩子羡慕浪漫的爱情。
words.sentence_pinyin: hěn duō nǚ hái zi xiàn mù làng màn de ài qíng 。
words.sentence_meaning: Many girls envy romantic love.

words.sentence: 你不会给她星星。
words.sentence_pinyin: nǐ bú huì gěi tā xīng xīng 。
words.sentence_meaning: You won't give her stars.

words.sentence: 浪漫是即使晚上加班到零点……
words.sentence_pinyin: làng màn shì jí shǐ wǎn shàng jiā bān dào líng diǎn ……
words.sentence_meaning: Romance is even if you work overtime until midnight...

words.sentence: 浪漫是即使晚上加班到零点……
words.sentence_pinyin: làng màn shì jí shǐ wǎn shàng jiā bān dào líng diǎn ……
words.sentence_meaning: Romance is even if you work overtime until midnight...

words.sentence: 自己家里也还亮着灯。
words.sentence_pinyin: zì jǐ jiā lǐ yě hái liàng zhe dēng 。
words.sentence_meaning: The lights are still on in my own home.

words.sentence: 其实，让我们感动的，就是生活中简单的爱情。
words.sentence_pinyin: qí shí ， ràng wǒ men gǎn dòng de ， jiù shì shēng huó zhōng jiǎn dān de ài qíng 。
words.sentence_meaning: In fact, what moves us is the simple love in life.

sections.title: Text 5 爱情与性格
sections.title_pinyin: Text 5  ài qíng yǔ xìng gé
sections.title_meaning: Text 5 Love and Character

words.sentence: 人们就会很自然地想起爱情。
words.sentence_pinyin: rén men jiù huì hěn zì rán dì xiǎng qǐ ài qíng 。
words.sentence_meaning: People will naturally think of love.

words.sentence: 爱情是结婚的重要原因。
words.sentence_pinyin: ài qíng shì jié hūn de zhòng yào yuán yīn 。
words.sentence_meaning: Love is an important reason for marriage.

words.sentence: 更需要性格上互相吸引。
words.sentence_pinyin: gèng xū yào xìng gé shàng hù xiāng xī yǐn 。
words.sentence_meaning: It is more necessary to attract each other in terms of personality.

words.sentence: 更需要性格上互相吸引。
words.sentence_pinyin: gèng xū yào xìng gé shàng hù xiāng xī yǐn 。
words.sentence_meaning: It is more necessary to attract each other in terms of personality.

words.sentence: 我丈夫是个很幽默的人。
words.sentence_pinyin: wǒ zhàng fū shì gè hěn yōu mò de rén 。
words.sentence_meaning: My husband is a very humorous person.

words.sentence: 而且他的脾气也不错。
words.sentence_pinyin: ér qiě tā de pí qì yě bù cuò 。
words.sentence_meaning: And he has a good temper.

sections.title: Text 1 小夏和马克聊马克的中国朋友
sections.title_pinyin: Text 1  xiǎo xià hé mǎ kè liáo mǎ kè de zhōng guó péng yǒu
sections.title_meaning: Text 1 Xiaoxia and Mark chat about Mark’s Chinese friends

words.sentence: 你适应这儿的生活了吗？
words.sentence_pinyin: nǐ shì yìng zhè ér de shēng huó le ma ？
words.sentence_meaning: Have you adapted to life here?

words.sentence: 最近我还交了一个中国朋友。
words.sentence_pinyin: zuì jìn wǒ hái jiāo le yí gè zhōng guó péng yǒu 。
words.sentence_meaning: Recently I also made a Chinese friend.

words.sentence: 平时我们常常一起看书、逛街、踢足球。
words.sentence_pinyin: píng shí wǒ men cháng cháng yì qǐ kàn shū 、 guàng jiē 、 tī zú qiú 。
words.sentence_meaning: We usually read books, go shopping and play football together.

words.sentence: 平时我们常常一起看书、逛街、踢足球。
words.sentence_pinyin: píng shí wǒ men cháng cháng yì qǐ kàn shū 、 guàng jiē 、 tī zú qiú 。
words.sentence_meaning: We usually read books, go shopping and play football together.

words.sentence: 有时候他还给我发一些幽默短信。
words.sentence_pinyin: yǒu shí hòu tā huán gěi wǒ fā yī xiē yōu mò duǎn xìn 。
words.sentence_meaning: Sometimes he also sends me some humorous text messages.

words.sentence: 我们下午要去踢足球，正好一起去吧。
words.sentence_pinyin: wǒ men xià wǔ yào qù tī zú qiú ， zhèng hǎo yì qǐ qù ba 。
words.sentence_meaning: We are going to play football in the afternoon, so let's go together.

sections.title: Text 2 小李和小林聊同学聚会的事情
sections.title_pinyin: Text 2  xiǎo lǐ hé xiǎo lín liáo tóng xué jù huì de shì qíng
sections.title_meaning: Text 2 Xiao Li and Xiao Lin talk about the class reunion

words.sentence: 星期天同学聚会，你能来吗？
words.sentence_pinyin: xīng qī tiān tóng xué jù huì ， nǐ néng lái ma ？
words.sentence_meaning: Class reunion on Sunday, can you come?

words.sentence: 班里同学你联系得怎么样了？
words.sentence_pinyin: bān lǐ tóng xué nǐ lián xì dé zěn me yàng le ？
words.sentence_meaning: How are you keeping in touch with your classmates?

words.sentence: 差不多一半儿吧。
words.sentence_pinyin: chà bu duō yí bàn ér ba 。
words.sentence_meaning: Almost half.

words.sentence: 张远还专门从国外飞回来呢。
words.sentence_pinyin: zhāng yuǎn hái zhuān mén cóng guó wài fēi huí lái ne 。
words.sentence_meaning: Zhang Yuan even flew back from abroad.

words.sentence: 毕业都快十年了。
words.sentence_pinyin: bì yè dōu kuài shí nián le 。
words.sentence_meaning: It’s been almost ten years since I graduated.

words.sentence: 麻烦你跟她联系一下。
words.sentence_pinyin: má fán nǐ gēn tā lián xì yī xià 。
words.sentence_meaning: Please contact her.

sections.title: Text 3 孙月和王静聊她们的朋友
sections.title_pinyin: Text 3  sūn yuè hé wáng jìng liáo tā men de péng yǒu
sections.title_meaning: Text 3 Sun Yue and Wang Jing chat about their friends

words.sentence: 好像重新回到了校园。
words.sentence_pinyin: hǎo xiàng chóng xīn huí dào le xiào yuán 。
words.sentence_meaning: It seemed like I was back on campus again.

words.sentence: 好像重新回到了校园。
words.sentence_pinyin: hǎo xiàng chóng xīn huí dào le xiào yuán 。
words.sentence_meaning: It seemed like I was back on campus again.

words.sentence: 尽管已经毕业这么多年，我们还是经常联系的。
words.sentence_pinyin: jǐn guǎn yǐ jīng bì yè zhè me duō nián ， wǒ men hái shì jīng cháng lián xì de 。
words.sentence_meaning: Even though we have graduated so many years ago, we still keep in touch frequently.

words.sentence: 能有一个真正的朋友，有一段真正的友谊，是多么不容易！
words.sentence_pinyin: néng yǒu yí gè zhēn zhèng de péng yǒu ， yǒu yī duàn zhēn zhèng de yǒu yì ， shì duō me bù róng yì ！
words.sentence_meaning: How difficult it is to have a true friend and a true friendship!

words.sentence: 有一段真正的友谊，是多么不容易！
words.sentence_pinyin: yǒu yī duàn zhēn zhèng de yǒu yì ， shì duō me bù róng yì ！
words.sentence_meaning: How difficult it is to have a true friendship!

sections.title: Text 4 怎样交朋友
sections.title_pinyin: Text 4  zěn yàng jiāo péng yǒu
sections.title_meaning: Text 4 How to make friends

words.sentence: 朋友可以丰富我们的生活。
words.sentence_pinyin: péng yǒu kě yǐ fēng fù wǒ men de shēng huó 。
words.sentence_meaning: Friends can enrich our lives.

words.sentence: 离开朋友，我们的生活一定非常无聊。
words.sentence_pinyin: lí kāi péng yǒu ， wǒ men de shēng huó yí dìng fēi cháng wú liáo 。
words.sentence_meaning: Without friends, our life must be very boring.

words.sentence: 一个脾气不好的人虽然不一定让人讨厌……
words.sentence_pinyin: yí gè pí qì bù hǎo de rén suī rán bù yí dìng ràng rén tǎo yàn ……
words.sentence_meaning: Although a person with a bad temper is not necessarily annoying...

words.sentence: ……但是却很难跟人交朋友。
words.sentence_pinyin: …… dàn shì què hěn nán gēn rén jiāo péng yǒu 。
words.sentence_meaning: …But it’s hard to make friends with people.

words.sentence: 我们还要经常跟周围的人交流。
words.sentence_pinyin: wǒ men hái yào jīng cháng gēn zhōu wéi de rén jiāo liú 。
words.sentence_meaning: We also need to communicate frequently with the people around us.

words.sentence: 我们还要经常跟周围的人交流。
words.sentence_pinyin: wǒ men hái yào jīng cháng gēn zhōu wéi de rén jiāo liú 。
words.sentence_meaning: We also need to communicate frequently with the people around us.

sections.title: Text 5 什么是真正的朋友
sections.title_pinyin: Text 5  shén me shì zhēn zhèng de péng yǒu
sections.title_meaning: Text 5 What is a true friend?

words.sentence: 不同的人会有不同的理解。
words.sentence_pinyin: bù tóng de rén huì yǒu bù tóng de lǐ jiě 。
words.sentence_meaning: Different people will have different understandings.

words.sentence: 有些人觉得朋友应该像镜子。
words.sentence_pinyin: yǒu xiē rén jué de péng yǒu yīng gāi xiàng jìng zi 。
words.sentence_meaning: Some people think friends should be like mirrors.

words.sentence: 而我的理解是……
words.sentence_pinyin: ér wǒ de lǐ jiě shì ……
words.sentence_meaning: And my understanding is...

words.sentence: 当你遇到困难的时候……
words.sentence_pinyin: dāng nǐ yù dào kùn nán de shí hòu ……
words.sentence_meaning: When you encounter difficulties...

words.sentence: 当你遇到困难的时候……
words.sentence_pinyin: dāng nǐ yù dào kùn nán de shí hòu ……
words.sentence_meaning: When you encounter difficulties...

words.sentence: 及时给你帮助。
words.sentence_pinyin: jí shí gěi nǐ bāng zhù 。
words.sentence_meaning: Give you timely help.

words.sentence: 真正的朋友会陪在你身边。
words.sentence_pinyin: zhēn zhèng de péng yǒu huì péi zài nǐ shēn biān 。
words.sentence_meaning: Real friends will be there for you.

3.title: 经理对我印象不错
3.title_pinyin: jīng lǐ duì wǒ yìn xiàng bù cuò
3.title_meaning: The manager has a good impression of me

sections.title: Text 1 小夏和小雨聊面试的情况
sections.title_pinyin: Text 1  xiǎo xià hé xiǎo yǔ liáo miàn shì de qíng kuàng
sections.title_meaning: Text 1 Xiaoxia and Xiaoyu chat about the interview situation

words.sentence: 他们问的问题都挺容易的。
words.sentence_pinyin: tā men wèn de wèn tí dōu tǐng róng yì de 。
words.sentence_meaning: The questions they asked were pretty easy.

words.sentence: 就是我有点儿紧张。
words.sentence_pinyin: jiù shì wǒ yǒu diǎn ér jǐn zhāng 。
words.sentence_meaning: I'm just a little nervous.

words.sentence: 一定要对自己有信心。
words.sentence_pinyin: yí dìng yào duì zì jǐ yǒu xìn xīn 。
words.sentence_meaning: You must have confidence in yourself.

words.sentence: 要相信自己的能力。
words.sentence_pinyin: yào xiāng xìn zì jǐ de néng lì 。
words.sentence_meaning: Believe in your own abilities.

words.sentence: 3月15号上午8点在学校体育馆还有一个招聘会。
words.sentence_pinyin: 3 yuè 15 hào shàng wǔ 8 diǎn zài xué xiào tǐ yù guǎn hái yǒu yí gè zhāo pìn huì 。
words.sentence_meaning: There will be a job fair at 8 a.m. on March 15th in the school gymnasium.

words.sentence: 听说这次招聘会提供的工作机会很多。
words.sentence_pinyin: tīng shuō zhè cì zhāo pìn huì tí gōng de gōng zuò jī huì hěn duō 。
words.sentence_meaning: I heard that this job fair provides many job opportunities.

sections.title: Text 2 马经理和小林聊招聘的事情
sections.title_pinyin: Text 2  mǎ jīng lǐ hé xiǎo lín liáo zhāo pìn de shì qíng
sections.title_meaning: Text 2 Manager Ma and Xiao Lin talk about recruitment

words.sentence: 这次招聘不是小李负责吗？
words.sentence_pinyin: zhè cì zhāo pìn bú shì xiǎo lǐ fù zé ma ？
words.sentence_meaning: Isn't Xiao Li responsible for this recruitment?

words.sentence: 本来是小李负责的。
words.sentence_pinyin: běn lái shì xiǎo lǐ fù zé de 。
words.sentence_meaning: Xiao Li was originally in charge.

words.sentence: 这次来应聘的一共有15人。
words.sentence_pinyin: zhè cì lái yìng pìn de yī gòng yǒu 15 rén 。
words.sentence_meaning: There are 15 people applying this time.

words.sentence: 这是他们的材料，您看看。
words.sentence_pinyin: zhè shì tā men de cái liào ， nín kàn kàn 。
words.sentence_meaning: This is their material, take a look.

words.sentence: 这两个人的能力都比较符合我们的要求。
words.sentence_pinyin: zhè liǎng gè rén de néng lì dōu bǐ jiào fú hé wǒ men de yāo qiú 。
words.sentence_meaning: The abilities of these two people are relatively in line with our requirements.

words.sentence: 你通知他们下周一上午九点来我办公室吧。
words.sentence_pinyin: nǐ tōng zhī tā men xià zhōu yī shàng wǔ jiǔ diǎn lái wǒ bàn gōng shì ba 。
words.sentence_meaning: You tell them to come to my office at nine o'clock next Monday morning.

sections.title: Text 3 小林和王静聊王静的工作情况
sections.title_pinyin: Text 3  xiǎo lín hé wáng jìng liáo wáng jìng de gōng zuò qíng kuàng
sections.title_meaning: Text 3 Xiao Lin and Wang Jing chat about Wang Jing’s work situation

words.sentence: 我一毕业就去上海当律师了。
words.sentence_pinyin: wǒ yī bì yè jiù qù shàng hǎi dāng lǜ shī le 。
words.sentence_meaning: As soon as I graduated, I went to Shanghai to work as a lawyer.

words.sentence: 因为我学的就是法律专业。
words.sentence_pinyin: yīn wèi wǒ xué de jiù shì fǎ lǜ zhuān yè 。
words.sentence_meaning: Because I majored in law.

words.sentence: 另外，收入也不错。
words.sentence_pinyin: lìng wài ， shōu rù yě bù cuò 。

words.sentence: 收入也不错。
words.sentence_pinyin: shōu rù yě bù cuò 。
words.sentence_meaning: The income is also good.

words.sentence: 星期天咱们同学聚会，你能来参加吗？
words.sentence_pinyin: xīng qī tiān zán men tóng xué jù huì ， nǐ néng lái cān jiā ma ？
words.sentence_meaning: We have a class reunion on Sunday. Can you come?

words.sentence: 时间安排得很紧张。
words.sentence_pinyin: shí jiān ān pái dé hěn jǐn zhāng 。
words.sentence_meaning: The schedule is tight.

sections.title: Text 4 面试需要注意什么
sections.title_pinyin: Text 4  miàn shì xū yào zhù yì shén me
sections.title_meaning: Text 4 What should you pay attention to during the interview?

words.sentence: 首先，要穿正式的衣服。
words.sentence_pinyin: shǒu xiān ， yào chuān zhèng shì de yī fú 。
words.sentence_meaning: First, wear formal clothes.

words.sentence: 要穿正式的衣服。
words.sentence_pinyin: yào chuān zhèng shì de yī fú 。
words.sentence_meaning: Wear formal clothes.

words.sentence: 这会给面试者留下一个好的印象。
words.sentence_pinyin: zhè huì gěi miàn shì zhě liú xià yí gè hǎo de yìn xiàng 。

words.sentence: 结果花了太多时间，后面简单的题我虽然会，可是时间来得及。

words.sentence_pinyin: zhè cì zhǔ yào shì yīn wèi wén zhāng xuǎn dé bǐ jiào nán ， bǐ jiào fù zá de tí 。

words.sentence: 看来要多想考好，不但要认真复习，还得注意考试的方法，否则，会做的题也没时间做了。
